objective: Bootstrap a minimal, deterministic MCP adapter that serves schemas, examples, validation, diff, and backend populate strictly over STDIO per docs/mcp_spec.md v0.2.3.

constraints.discovery: Environment overrides precede libs/synesthetic-schemas submodule; no fixture fallbacks
constraints.validation: Draft 2020-12 via jsonschema with 1 MiB payload cap and alias support
constraints.backend: Disabled unless SYN_BACKEND_URL provided; honor SYN_BACKEND_ASSETS_PATH

artifacts.entrypoint: python -m mcp must block on STDIO and emit mcp:ready after discovery
artifacts.ready_file: Write <pid> <ISO8601 timestamp> to MCP_READY_FILE on readiness; remove on shutdown
artifacts.tests: pytest suite covering discovery, validation, backend guards, diff determinism, and STDIO loop
